Package demolition

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    App
    Represents the PApplet App used to run the game.
    Bomb
    Represents a bomb utilized by the Player
    BomberChar
    Represents the parent class of in-game character classes: Player, RedEnemy, YellowEnemy
    BomberMap
    Represents the map layout of the game.
    GameMechanics
    Handles the mechanics of the game.
    GameObjects
    Represents the parent class of all in-game object classes : BomberChar, Bomb
    Player
    Represents the character controlled by the player, BombMan
    RedEnemy
    Represents the enemy of player, red enemy
    Tile
    Represents the tiles on the map layout.
    Tuple
    A mechanism which stores a pair of integers.
    UI
    Represents the user interface (UI) of the game, shown on the top border of the screen.
    YellowEnemy
    Represents the enemy of player, yellow enemy
